For those interested, here's the link for the prayer this year:

 Our nation is in dire need of prayer...and Christ said, Where two or three are gathered together in my name, there am I in the midst of them. (Matthew 18:20)
 
 I would encourage all those that believe in the power of prayer to remember our nation, today at noon.

Frankly, I believe we need a National Year of Daily Prayer. I pray everyday, at some time or another, but I seldom remember to include our leaders and world politics in the menu. I need to make a conscious effort to do that in the future.
